Code: EXEC SQL UPDATE SEGUROS.seguros.v0apolcorret SET RAMOFR = :RAMOFR, MODALIFR = :MODALIFR, CODCORR = :CODCORR, DTINIVIG = :DTINIVIG, DTTERVIG = :DTTERVIG, PCPARCOR = :PCPARCOR, PCCOMCOR = :PCCOMCOR, TIPCOM = :TIPCOM, INDCRT = :INDCRT, COD_EMPRESA = :COD_EMPRESA, TIMESTAMP = CURRENT TIMESTAMP, COD_USUARIO = :COD_USUARIO WHERE NUM_APOLICE = :NUM_APOLICE AND CODSUBES = :CODSUBES AND DTINIVIG = :VGFVW001.VGFVW001-DT-INI END SQL
